question: You arranged to visit a friend in Canada but an important event at home now means that you must change the dates of the visit.Write a letter to your friend. In your letterexplain the important eventapologise for the situationsuggest a new arrangement
text: Unfortunately, I have to make some changes to the trip to Canada we have been planning for so long. I just found out that my father's birthday party was shifted to a different time and I can not miss it.

Actually it will be my father's anniversary, 50 years. There will be a lot of our relatives and friends from different parts of the world. On top of that my mother rented a humongous space in the centre of Moscow. There will be plenty of food, come music performance and at the end my father is going to give a speech.
I am really sorry, but there is no way I may skip the event. I should have planned it more carefully before revealing it to you.

I suppose the party will take a day or two. If I was able to change my airline tickets, I would be able to come as soon as possible. Will it work for you if I come, for example, a week after the initial plan?
Please let me know about your ideas regarding that.

error_list.error_des: It appears that you are missing a comma after the introductory phrase Actually. Consider adding a comma.
